name: twind
description: To setup create virtaul env: python3 -m venv venv Activate: . venv/bin/activate Pip install: pip install watchdog Jinja then execute the watch_and_generate file: python watch_and_generate.py

scripts.update: git stash && git pull && git stash pop
scripts.push: git add . && git commit -m "update" && git push
scripts.sync: npm run update && npm run push
